en.description: Calculates statistics for raster datasets and mosaic datasets

processing_extent.description: Draw a geographic area where statistics are calculated, so they are not generated from the entire dataset

horizontal_skip_factor.description: Enter the number of horizontal pixels to skip

vertical_skip_factor.description: Enter the number of vertical pixels to skip

ignore_pixel_values.description: Enter the pixel values to exclude from the calculation. The default is the NoData value Multiple values can be entered using a semi-colon delimiter (i.e. 0;255).
